name: Tabbris Yor
description:
Tabbris Yor is a role playing game in which you serve as a Special Agent for private security firm. In the final release of the game, you will be immersed in epic adventures and challenges throughout the solar system. In this Beta-release, alien terrorists have fled to a human outpost on Ganymede, the largest moon of Jupiter. You have been assigned to track them down and eliminate them. You are outnumbered - do you have the experience and the skills to accomplish your mission?

The game features challenging enemy AI, a weapon which you can load and unload, kill-counter, ammo and health counter, pedestrians that flee gunfights, an awesome sci-fi environment and your very own cyberpunk apartment!
